Minecraft RoCkS!!

The first version of Minecraft was created in just six days, but the game wasn't deemed complete for anotehr two years. Minecraft is constatly adding new features. Creepers, a species in Minecraft, began as a coding error. Ghasts, a Minecraft monster is voiced by a sleeping cat. One in every 10,000 times you play the game, its introductory menu will flash a misspelling of its own title, reversing the “E” and the “C” to read, “Minceraft.”
